homePage.brief: I design and develop modern, creative websites.
homePage.whatIDo: With a passion for bringing unique brand visions to life, I create visually stunning and user-friendly web experiences that exceed client expectations.

intro.line1:
<0>Hey, I'm  </0><1>Julie Chou</1>, 

a Web Developer who loves working on projects from start to finish, including user research, design, and coding.
intro.line2: I'm from <1>Taiwan</1> and passionate about exploring new cultures. With travel experience from around the world, I bring a global perspective and deep appreciation for diversity to my work as a web developer.
intro.line3: I recently moved to <1>Brantford, Ontario </1> and I'm looking forward to continuing my journey in web development.
intro.line4: I'm currently looking for opportunities to collaborate with creative individuals and organizations to enhance my abilities, and build innovative digital solutions that make a positive impact on the world.

developer.line1: With a keen eye for detail, I ensure that every project is polished and professional. I am also a flexible learner who can quickly adapt to new technologies and requirements, enabling me to meet the unique demands of any project.
developer.line2: I specialize in creating high-quality, user-friendly websites using Frontend language and frameworks
developer.line3: I am interested in creating cool animations, and I am also eager to explore CMS platforms to unlock new possibilities for creativity.

designer.line1: With a background in Applied Art, I prioritize creating content structures that are easy to understand, using clean and thoughtful design patterns, and interactions that cater to the user's needs. I always strive to integrate the client's ideas and the website's main purpose into my designs.

projects.title: Explore My Latest Work
projects.info: If you have any questions or opportunities for collaboration, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.

core.title: CORE COMPETENCIES
core.detail1: Being meticulous and precise, paying attention to small details that impact the quality of work.
core.detail2: Generating new and innovative ideas and approaches to problem-solving.
core.detail3: Creating products or services that are easy to use and provide a positive experience for the user.
core.detail4: Having a strong desire to learn new things and grow your knowledge and skills.
core.detail5: Being resilient and creative in finding solutions to challenges.
core.detail6: Quickly learning and adapting to new technologies and tools.
core.detail7: Being efficient and productive, able to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
core.detail8: Working effectively in a team environment and communicating ideas clearly
core.funToWorkWith:
Oh, and by the way,
I'm also super fun to work with!

job.info:
Looking for any type of work.
Open to individual or company job opportunities where I can contribute my skills, learn new things, and continue to grow both personally and professionally.

contactForm.thankMessage: Thank you for getting in touch with me. I will get back to you shortly.
